articles.description: Jose Mourinho is sent off as his Fenerbahce side come from behind to condemn his old club Manchester United to a third successive Europa League draw.

articles.description: Red Bull driver Sergio Perez admits he has had "a terrible season" as he embarks on his home race this weekend.

articles.description: Jamie Smith is proving to be England's man for a crisis, while Ollie Pope is struggling to avoid a crisis of his own, writes Stephan Shemilt.
